title: How to Make a High Powered Pen Gun

steps.title: Remove the ink cartridge and end of the pen.
steps.content: Remove the ink cartridge and end of the pen. (hold onto the ink cartridge)

steps.title: Cut the writing end of the pen off.
steps.content: Cut the writing end of the pen off. (It makes it easier to fire.)

steps.title: Cut the elastic band in half so it becomes one strand.
steps.content: Cut the elastic band in half so it becomes one strand. Then put a dot in the center of the elastic band strand.

steps.title: Put the dot of the elastic band strand over the smaller opening of the pen (you can use a texta tube instead for it being larger)
steps.content: Put the dot of the elastic band strand over the smaller opening of the pen (you can use a texta tube instead for it being larger)

steps.title: Get both ends of the elastic band and pull them down either side of the pen, and sticky tape the ends of the elastic band onto either side of the pen with a little bit of the ends still out so you can turn them back over the sticky tape, and fold the ends over and tape them down again, to acquire greater holding and a lower chance of hurting one's self.
steps.content: Get both ends of the elastic band and pull them down either side of the pen, and sticky tape the ends of the elastic band onto either side of the pen with a little bit of the ends still out so you can turn them back over the sticky tape, and fold the ends over and tape them down again, to acquire greater holding and a lower chance of hurting one's self.

steps.title: In order to fire, slide an ink cartridge down with the writing part (nib) is facing outwards.
steps.content: In order to fire, slide an ink cartridge down with the writing part (nib) is facing outwards.

steps.title: Hold onto the end of the ink cartridge that you slid out the other side, and bring the dot of the elastic onto the end of the pen and grip onto the elastic band with the ink cartridge sandwiched in the middle.
steps.content: Hold onto the end of the ink cartridge that you slid out the other side, and bring the dot of the elastic onto the end of the pen and grip onto the elastic band with the ink cartridge sandwiched in the middle.

steps.title: Pull back on the elastic band and ink cartridge in the middle and in the other hand the pen gun.
steps.content: Pull back on the elastic band and ink cartridge in the middle and in the other hand the pen gun.

steps.title: Get a pen that you can hollow out.
steps.content: Get a pen that you can hollow out.

steps.title: Attach a red rubber band that has been cut into half.
steps.content: Attach a red rubber band that has been cut into half.

steps.title: Use some sticky tape and have it taped around, making sure that the red rubber band is parallel with the other end.
steps.content: Use some sticky tape and have it taped around, making sure that the red rubber band is parallel with the other end.

steps.title: Next, get the ink and put it down the big hole end, then pull the band back with the ink and fire!
steps.content: Next, get the ink and put it down the big hole end, then pull the band back with the ink and fire!
